summary: Along with a partner, a small-time crook arrives at the hometown of his mentor's killer to seek revenge, but gets caught in a fix upon befriending the killer's mother.
cast: Kyung-gu Sol|Han Sun Jo|Moon-hee Na|Woo-Sung Choi|Hie-bong Jo|Joon-bae Kim|Sang-sik Kim|Seong-deok Kwon|Min-Seok Oh|Yong Oh|Seung-ryong Ryu|Yi-yeong Shim|Je-mun Yun
title: Yeolhyeol-nama
